0.title: About
0.content: Tensor 1 is a first-person action adventure, developed as a hybrid of the Greatest Generation shooter/Generation X shooter sub-genres. Coming Soon: A Trailer .

1.title: Development Log
1.content: Welcome to the Official Development Log . | Welcome to Tensor! | .

2.title: Manual
2.content: Welcome to the Online Game Manual . This site is currently under construction, but will eventually feature a full guide on Tensor 1 and its built-in Tile based level editor.

3.title: Campaign
3.content: Campaign is the story mode of Tensor 1. Currently two story campaigns are available: . | Campaign A: a 4-level demonstration story campaign | Campaign B: a full 16-level story campaign | . Depending on interest, more story campaigns may be added in updates to the game. Version Differences: . | PC: contains campaigns A and B | Mobile: contains campaigns A and B | Demo: contains campaign A | .

4.title: Versus
4.content: Versus is the network multiplayer game mode. Connect with other friends over a Local Area Network (LAN) and compete in Death Match, Team Death Match, or Capture the Flag game modes. Version Differences: . | PC: includes Versus | Mobile: Versus not included | Demo: Versus not included | .

5.title: Tile Editor
5.content: The Level Editor is a tile-based editor used for making custom maps. Single-player and Multiplayer have separate level editors. The multiplayer version of the editor is accessible from the Versus menu. The single-player version of the editor is accessible in the Extras menu. Version Differences: . | PC: includes the Editor | Mobile: Editor not included | Demo: Editor not included | .

6.title: Survival
6.content: Survival is the randomized gauntlet “roguelite” game mode. Meta-inventory Tokens obtained from Survival can be used to purchase cosmetic rewards in the Profile section. Version Differences: . | PC: Includes Survival and Profile cosmetics | Mobile: Includes Survival and Profile cosmetics | Demo: Includes Survival, does not include Profile unlockables | .

7.title: Buy Now
7.content: Tensor 1 Versions: . Choose the version that fits your budget! . | PC (Steam): Includes Campaign (A, B), Survival, Versus, Profile, Editor, only $9.99 | Mobile: Includes Campaign (A, B), Survival, Profile, only $4.99 | Demo: Includes Campaign (A), Survival, FREE | .
